Database - Class in com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference
Database class which manage the DonationMakeDifference DB which contains Application table and Donation Table
Database(Context) - Constructor for class com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.Database
 
deleteApplication(String) - Method in class com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.Database
Delete a application from data base
deleteDonation(String) - Method in class com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.Database
Delete a donation from data base
deletePost(Context, String) - Method in class com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.Donation
This is a abstract method, child classes can implement it differently SpecialUser is a user who have been proved by admin and be able to post donation Special user can delete their own post Admin can delete any post if admin this the post is inappropriate
deletePost(Context, String) - Method in class com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.DonationAdmin
In this method, admin can delete any post if admin this the post is inappropriate
deletePost(Context, String) - Method in class com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.DonationSpecialUser
SpecialUser is a user who have been proved by admin and be able to post donation In this method, special user can delete their own post
doApplication(Context, ApplicationUser) - Method in class com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.ApplicationAdmin
This method is called when admin is reviewing an single application They can choose to deny it or approve it
doApplication(Context, ApplicationUser) - Method in class com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.ApplicationUser
This method is called when user want to submit their own donation application
doApplication(Context, ApplicationUser) - Method in class com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.DonationApplication
This is abstract method, child class will implement it differently User will be able to submit the application Admin will be able to review the application
donate() - Method in class com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.DonationFacade
This method is called when user hit the donation button it checks whether the credit card information is valid and whether the amount of money user donated exceed the amount of money a donation required
